reduceMotionDescription: Disable animated background effects (fixes flickering on some GPUs)
launchAtLoginDescription: Start Velo automatically when you log in (minimized to tray)
blockRemoteImagesDescription: Hides tracking pixels and remote images until you choose to load them
phishingDescription: Scan message links for phishing indicators and show warnings
smartNotificationsDescription: Only notify for selected categories and VIP senders
vipDescription: These senders always trigger notifications regardless of category
sendAndArchiveDescription: Automatically archive threads after sending a reply
labelsDescription: Create, rename, recolor, delete, or reorder your Gmail labels.
filtersDescription: Filters automatically apply actions to new incoming emails during sync.
smartLabelsDescription: Describe what emails should get a label using plain English. AI automatically labels matching emails during sync.
smartFoldersDescription: Smart folders are saved searches that automatically show matching emails. Use search operators like
quickStepsDescription: Quick steps let you chain multiple actions together into a single click. Apply them from the right-click menu on any thread.
contactsDescription: Contacts are automatically added when you send or receive emails. Edit display names or remove contacts below.
subscriptionsDescription: View all detected newsletter and promotional senders. Unsubscribe using RFC 8058 one-click POST, mailto, or browser fallback.
sendAsDescription: These aliases are synced from your Gmail settings. You can select which alias to use as the default sender.
noAliases: No aliases found. Aliases are fetched from Gmail on startup.
syncPeriodNote: Changes apply on the next full resync.
pendingOpsDescription: Changes waiting to sync to the server
failedOpsDescription: Changes that could not be synced after multiple retries
quickComposeDescription: Open compose window from any app
clickToRebind: Click a shortcut to rebind it. Press any key or key combination to set.
providerDescription: Choose which AI provider to use for summarization, compose assistance, and smart categorization.
localAiDescription: Connect to a local Ollama or LMStudio server. No API key required.
copilotDescription: Requires a GitHub PAT with models:read permission.
enableAiDescription: Master toggle for all AI functionality
autoCategorizeDescription: Use AI to refine rule-based categorization
autoSummarizeDescription: Show AI summaries on multi-message threads
autoDraftDescription: Pre-populate the reply editor with an AI-generated draft
learnWritingStyleDescription: Analyze your sent emails to match your tone and voice
writingStyleReanalyze: Reanalyze your writing style from recent sent emails
categoriesDescription: Incoming emails are automatically sorted using rule-based heuristics (Gmail labels, sender domain, headers). When AI is enabled, it refines results for better accuracy.
categoriesArchiveNote: Enable auto-archive to skip the inbox for specific categories.
bundlingDescription: Collapse categories into a single row in the inbox. Optionally set a delivery schedule to batch emails.
openDevToolsDescription: Open the WebView developer tools inspector
aboutDescription: A fast, open-source desktop email client built with privacy in mind. Your emails stay on your machine â€” no cloud, no tracking.
licenseDescription: Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0. You may obtain a copy of the License at
